SELECT mr.mr_id, m.material_name, mr.qty, mr.unit, mr.request_date, mr.approved, mr.approved_date, mr.note, e.name as request_by_name FROM Material_Request mr LEFT JOIN Materials m ON mr.mr_id = m.mr_id LEFT JOIN Employees e ON mr.request_by = e.employee_id WHERE mr.approved = 0
AND m.material_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
mr.request_date m.material_name mr.request_date
DESC ASC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Material_Request mr LEFT JOIN Materials m ON mr.mr_id = m.mr_id WHERE mr.approved = 0
AND m.material_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT fm.MATERIAL_NAME, fm.QTY * #{qty} AS REQUIRED_QTY, fm.UNIT FROM FIXED_MATERIAL fm WHERE fm.FP_ID = #{productId}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(l.QTY), 0) FROM MATERIAL m JOIN LOTS l ON m.LOTS_ID = l.LOT_ID WHERE m.MATERIAL_NAME = #{materialName}
